name: Bronzong
description: The Bronze Bell Pokémon. One caused a news sensation when it was dug up at a construction site after a 2,000-year sleep.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to ground moves.

abilities.name: Heatproof
abilities.description: This Pokemon takes half the damage it otherwise would from Fire damage, and is immune to the burning condition.

abilities.name: Heavy Metal
abilities.description: This Pokémon is especially heavy. Once per long rest, after being targeted by an attack, it may increase its AC by 2 if it would cause an attack to miss.
